title: Wevorce's CEO Michelle Crosby Honored as 2015 40 Under 40 Award Winner by Silicon Valley Business Journal
text:
SOURCE: Wevorce July 20, 2015 14:08 ET Wevorce's CEO Michelle Crosby Honored as 2015 40 Under 40 Award Winner by Silicon Valley Business Journal 
SAN MATEO, CA--(Marketwired - Jul 20, 2015) - Wevorce , a company that offers an innovative technology platform and five step process to make every divorce amicable, announced today that its CEO, Michelle Crosby, has been honored by Silicon Valley Business Journal as a 2015 40 Under 40 award winner. Last Friday, the editors of the publication announced the recipients of the 2015 40 Under 40 Awards representing the most accomplished young talent in the Silicon Valley area. 
Michelle Crosby launched Wevorce, a company dedicated to changing divorce for good by keeping families out of court. With a step-by-step approach, Wevorce helps couples divorce amicably using its web-based technology to offer structure and automate the paperwork. Methodology focuses on the untangling of complex issues while mitigating the mental anguish and financial burden of divorce, all at a fraction of the cost. 
Through the divorce archetypes that Michelle and her team developed, Wevorce can predict the costs and steps families need to take to settle their divorce with 97% accuracy. And, the services generally cost about one-third of a typical divorce (the national avg. is $27,000). To date, Wevorce has processed over $40 million in assets through its platform and has saved families about $4M in legal fees. Over 300 families have engaged with Wevorce, and in 2014, Wevorce kept 100% of its active families out of court. 
Most recently, Michelle created the Wevorce Community, a network of diverse professionals that has grown from 20 members to more than 400 since March 2015. Wevorce is now able to provide post-divorce services to families also in need of real estate, insurance, financial or emotional support. 
"I am humbled to be a recipient of this award and would like to thank Silicon Valley Business Journal. It's an honor to be included among this group of entrepreneurs," said Michelle. "I am thankful and impressed with the hard-working divorce professionals, mediators, and our team of experts at Wevorce that are committed to our movement and changing the divorce process for good." 
Silicon Valley Business Journal is hosting an awards ceremony to honor the class of 2015 40 Under 40 winners on August 20, 2015 in San Francisco. To see the entire list of winners please visit, 2015 Silicon Valley Business Journal 40 Under 40 . 
About Wevorce 
Wevorce is disrupting the $30 billion market for divorce services with an innovative technology platform and step-by-step family-centric mediation process designed to make every divorce amicable. The company was born out of founder Michelle Crosby's own traumatic experience as a child of divorce. The Wevorce technology platform and methodology have been proven to ensure a better outcome for families, both during and after their divorce. Based in the Bay Area, Wevorce is venture backed by Y Combinator, Foundation Capital and others. Visit www.Wevorce.com .
